page.title: 17CAUSES FOR CONCERN-MENSTRIE
page.content: In our recent survey many of the villagers expressed their concern over the amount of{vandalism}in the area such as the{pollution}of the burn, church windows being smashed,{graffiti on the park pavilion walls. Also several newly planted saplings have had their top branches taken off. There is also concern that more {amenities}are needed. A large number of people want a chemist and many expressed a desire for a leisure centre. A lot of people were displeased at the amount of{noise}each night from separate gangs and people leaving the pub. {Speeding motorists}are also a cause for concern.
